attributes.action: demand that the Speaker of the Parliament standown due to his total lack of understanding of public anger about MPs expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition aims to allow people express their anger at the Speaker (Michael Martin) after his speech of 11th May 2009 about MPs expenses. He was totally flippant with MPs who expressed their concern about the issue.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
